Summary: A hexagon shaped craft flew over top of my friend and I
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Greensburg

divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting my parents in Indiana and I had brought a childhood friend along named "Bartel" when we arrived we visited my folks and then later met up with my cousin "Richardson" we stayed the night over at his house and as it got later at night we decided to go outside where me and "Bartel" were partying not to hard mind you but partying when I noticed what looked like headlights very far off in the distance just above the tree tops I got my friends attention and jokingly talked about the flying car from the movie flubber starring Robin Williams doubt your firmiliar with it quite a stupid movie but anyway the flying car off in the night sky was creeping very very slowly maybe 10m.p.h. toward us and was making no more than a quiet humming noise we instantly knew this wasn't right nothing man made is as quiet or able to move as slowly as this craft did without falling out of the sky so we got exciteable as we have both seen things before but nothing quite as up close and personal as this anyway the craft kept moving closer until it was just 75 feet (estimate)above us it was shaped like a thin hexagon in relation to it's length maybe 25-30' long and 10-15' wide there were 2 lights on the front of the craft placed basically just like a cars headlights there were small steady red lights an every point of the hexagon except the front my friend "Bartel" was going to attempt to shine a flashlight he had at it but I wasn't having anything of the sort (tempting unknown forces)so I smacked the flashlight out of his hand and quietly said no and we both stared slack jawed as the craft slowly flew away from us until it was out of sight it didn't feel real we just stood there for at least 15 minutes more shaking our heads wondering what the hell had just happened like i said earlier we have both seen things before but nothing like this i'm not a conspiracy theorist at all generally they sicken me but it just screamed government but obviously influenced by higher technology. I don't wan't this posted but I would be happy to answer any questions you may have
